name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with two processors controlling 8 microphones. Magnificent sound quality with 30mm drivers. Up to 30-hour battery life with quick charging. Multipoint connection allows you to quickly switch between devices.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2 13-inch
description: Redesigned around the next-generation M2 chip, MacBook Air is strikingly thin and brings exceptional speed and power efficiency within its durable enclosure. It's the ultrafast, ultracapable laptop that lets you work, play, or create just about anything — anywhere.

name: Samsung 55-inch QLED 4K Smart TV
description: Experience quantum dot technology that delivers a billion shades of brilliant color. Dual LED backlights adjust automatically to match your content. Quantum HDR brings out details and contrast. Built-in Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mirrorless Camera
description: Full-frame 20.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor with advanced DIGIC X Image Processor. 4K 60p video recording. In-Body Image Stabilization up to 8 stops. Dual Pixel CMOS AF II with 1,053 AF areas.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
description: Quiet clicks with 90% noise reduction. 8K DPI sensor for precision. MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel. Work seamlessly across 3 devices. Ergonomic design for all-day comfort.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 Running Shoes
description: Responsive cushioning in the Pegasus 40 helps give you extra spring in your step. The mesh upper is comfortable and breathable. Waffle-inspired pattern provides excellent traction.

name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: The original blue jean since 1873. Classic straight fit with a button fly. Sits at the waist, straight through hip and thigh. Made with premium denim for durability and comfort.

name: North Face Thermoball Eco Jacket
description: Highly compressible jacket with synthetic insulation that mimics down warmth. Made with recycled materials. Water-repellent finish. Packable into its own pocket for easy storage.

name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece
description: Warm, heathered, sweater-knit fleece with a quarter-zip pullover design. Dyed with a low-impact process. Fair Trade Certified sewn. Fleece is bluesign approved.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23 Shoes
description: Return energy with every step thanks to responsive BOOST cushioning. Primeknit+ textile upper adapts to your foot. Continental rubber outsole for superior traction in all conditions.

name: KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer 5-Quart
description: Iconic design with 10 speeds for nearly any task or recipe. 5-quart stainless steel bowl with comfortable handle. Includes flat beater, dough hook, and wire whip. Tilt-head design for easy access.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
description: Laser reveals microscopic dust. Counts and measures particles. Powerful suction with 240 AW. Up to 60 minutes runtime. Converts to handheld. Advanced whole-machine filtration.

name: Instant Pot Duo Plus 8-Quart
description: 9-in-1 functionality: pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, sauté pan, yogurt maker, warmer, sous vide, and sterilizer. 15 customizable Smart Programs.

name: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine
description: Integrated conical burr grinder delivers fresh grounds directly to the portafilter. Digital temperature control (PID) for precise espresso extraction. Auto purge after steam for optimal temperature.

name: West Elm Mid-Century Modern Sofa
description: Clean-lined sofa with tailored cushions and tapered legs. Kiln-dried hardwood frame. High-density foam cushions wrapped in fiber. Performance velvet upholstery resists stains and fading.

name: Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Smart LED bulbs with 16 million colors. Control via app, voice, or automation. Includes bridge and 4 bulbs. Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple HomeKit.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Bluetooth Speaker
description: 360-degree sound with deep, powerful bass. Water and dust resistant (IP55). Up to 17 hours of battery life. Built-in microphone for speakerphone. Portable with carrying handle.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 11-inch
description: Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate. Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor. IP68 water and dust resistance. S Pen included. All-day battery with 45W fast charging.

name: GoPro HERO12 Black Action Camera
description: 5.3K60 video and 27MP photos. HyperSmooth 6.0 stabilization. Waterproof to 33ft without housing. HDR photo and video. TimeWarp 3.0. Voice control.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 Mechanical Keyboard
description: Green mechanical switches with tactile and clicky feedback. Razer Chroma RGB with per-key lighting. Programmable macro support. Magnetic wrist rest. Doubleshot ABS keycaps.

name: Columbia Men's Fleece Jacket
description: Classic full-zip fleece jacket with two side zippered pockets. MTR filament fleece offers lightweight warmth. Binding at collar and cuffs. Perfect for layering.

name: Cuisinart 12-Cup Coffee Maker
description: Programmable 24-hour brew start. Adjustable auto shutoff. 1-4 cup setting. Self-clean function. Gold-tone reusable filter and charcoal water filter included.

name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
description: Active Noise Cancellation with Adaptive Audio. Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking. Up to 6 hours listening time. MagSafe charging case with speaker and lanyard loop.

name: YETI Rambler 30oz Tumbler
description: Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold or hot for hours. Dishwasher safe. No Sweat Design prevents condensation. MagSlider lid included. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel.
